title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water. Fry bacon until crispy. Beat eggs with grated Parmesan. Drain pasta, mix with bacon, remove from heat, and quickly stir in egg mixture. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours. Grill chicken until cooked. Sauté onion and garlic in butter, add tomato sauce and cream. Simmer for 10 minutes, add grilled chicken, and cook for 5 more minutes. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce. Toss with Caesar dressing. Top with grated Parmesan cheese and croutons. Add anchovies if desired. Serve immediately.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet. Add taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened. Warm taco shells. Fill shells with beef and top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and toss to coat. Serve hot over rice.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake with creamy frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, milk, and oil, beat well. Stir in hot water. Pour into greased pans. Bake 30-35 minutes. Cool completely before frosting.
